name: Bau Alase
description:
Bau Alase (holly ford) is the name used to define this canyon. Super combination of waterfalls, pools, dives, jumps.

Approach

From the parking (coordinates) take a steep path uphill which then proceeds into the woods until it comes alongside and follows a fence. Follow the orographic right of the stream for a few minutes to enter it at some large dry trees.

Descent

Exit

From the base of the last waterfall, follow the course of the river for few minutes, returning to the bridge where the car is parked.
